title: SeekandHit Interview Task
text:
Introduction
Hello and welcome to this project where I tried to explain and nicely present my analysis, thoughts, comments â€¦ around the interview task that I got from Ivan, which we will discuss in our next chat.
The main points are:
You can find a TLDR / Executive summary in the Summary section. This is a condensed format of the main takeaways and does not bother with code or charts and is suitable for a quick and short overview.
The individual sections that look at the different views of the data can be found in Country, Country / Medium and Conversion paths. I tried to express here my thoughts and investigations into text and code to reflect my approach to this task.
Some thoughts and ideas that did not fit anywhere above but were - in my opinion - worth keeping, can be found in the Appendix section.

title: SeekandHit Interview Task
text:
Callout
While one of the main points is around keeping profitability no data on marketing spend was provided which is essential in order to determine this.
Nevertheless, the data provided contained many interesting insights already - and besides that, I think it should not be too hard to also add this aspect to the existing analysis.
